message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Cleanup: unused marketing components + web feedback type error

## Context
The design system consolidation moved components from `components/ui/` to `components/`, creating duplicates. Many components (Solar template leftovers) are commented out in routes. Three have broken imports causing typecheck failures. One web feedback form is missing a required field.

## Dependency trace from routes

**Used (keep):**
- `components/footer.tsx` ← __root.tsx
- `components/navbar.tsx` ← __root.tsx
- `components/fade.tsx` ← changelog, changelog-entry, ui/hero
- `components/changelog-entry.tsx` ← changelog
- `components/mdx-content.tsx` ← content/$slug
- `components/icons.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/orbit.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/ui/features.tsx` ← index.tsx
- `components/ui/hero.tsx` ← index.tsx
- `components/ui/chip-viz.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/ui/hero-background.tsx` ← ui/hero
- `public/solar-mark.tsx` ← ui/chip-viz

## Delete: unused components (14 files)

`src/components/`:
- `analytics-illustration.tsx` — broken import, unused
- `button.tsx` — only dep of call-to-action (unused)
- `call-to-action.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `chip-viz.tsx` — duplicate of ui/chip-viz
- `divider.tsx` — only dep of feature-divider (unused)
- `feature-divider.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `features.tsx` — duplicate of ui/features
- `hero-background.tsx` — duplicate of ui/hero-background
- `hero.tsx` — duplicate of ui/hero
- `map/map.tsx` + `map/svg-map.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `sticker-card.tsx` — only used by ui/solar-analytics (unused)
- `table.tsx` — only dep of analytics-illustration (unused)
- `testimonial.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx

## Delete: unused ui/ components (10 files)

`src/components/ui/`:
- `analytics-illustration.tsx` — unused
- `call-to-action.tsx` — commented out
- `feature-divider.tsx` — commented out
- `footer.tsx` — superseded by root-level footer
- `map/map.tsx` + `map/svg-map.tsx` — commented out
- `navbar.tsx` — superseded by root-level navbar
- `solar-analytics.tsx` — commented out
- `sticker-card.tsx` — only dep of solar-analytics (unused)
- `testimonial.tsx` — commented out

## Delete: unused public assets (8 files)

- `public/laxdb-logo.tsx` — zero references in src/
- `public/solar-logo.tsx` — zero references in src/
- `public/images/line-chart-illustration.tsx` — only dep of analytics-illustration (unused)
- `public/images/clouds.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/drone.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/droneold.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/farm-footer.webp` — only in unused components
- `public/images/field.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/smiller.jpeg` — only in unused components

## Fix: clean up index.tsx

Remove 5 commented-out imports in `src/routes/index.tsx` (lines 3-4, 7-9).

## Fix: web feedback type error

`packages/web/src/routes/_protected/$organizationSlug/feedback.tsx:38` — add `attachments` field to match `CreateFeedbackInput` schema.

## Verification

1. `trash` all files listed above
2. Remove commented imports from index.tsx
3. Fix feedback.tsx type error
4. Run `bun run typecheck` — should pass clean


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/jw/.REDACTED.jsonl

If this plan can be broken down into multiple independent tasks, consider using the TeamCreate tool to create a team and parallelize the work.

planContent:
# Cleanup: unused marketing components + web feedback type error

## Context
The design system consolidation moved components from `components/ui/` to `components/`, creating duplicates. Many components (Solar template leftovers) are commented out in routes. Three have broken imports causing typecheck failures. One web feedback form is missing a required field.

## Dependency trace from routes

**Used (keep):**
- `components/footer.tsx` ← __root.tsx
- `components/navbar.tsx` ← __root.tsx
- `components/fade.tsx` ← changelog, changelog-entry, ui/hero
- `components/changelog-entry.tsx` ← changelog
- `components/mdx-content.tsx` ← content/$slug
- `components/icons.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/orbit.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/ui/features.tsx` ← index.tsx
- `components/ui/hero.tsx` ← index.tsx
- `components/ui/chip-viz.tsx` ← ui/features
- `components/ui/hero-background.tsx` ← ui/hero
- `public/solar-mark.tsx` ← ui/chip-viz

## Delete: unused components (14 files)

`src/components/`:
- `analytics-illustration.tsx` — broken import, unused
- `button.tsx` — only dep of call-to-action (unused)
- `call-to-action.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `chip-viz.tsx` — duplicate of ui/chip-viz
- `divider.tsx` — only dep of feature-divider (unused)
- `feature-divider.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `features.tsx` — duplicate of ui/features
- `hero-background.tsx` — duplicate of ui/hero-background
- `hero.tsx` — duplicate of ui/hero
- `map/map.tsx` + `map/svg-map.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx
- `sticker-card.tsx` — only used by ui/solar-analytics (unused)
- `table.tsx` — only dep of analytics-illustration (unused)
- `testimonial.tsx` — commented out in index.tsx

## Delete: unused ui/ components (10 files)

`src/components/ui/`:
- `analytics-illustration.tsx` — unused
- `call-to-action.tsx` — commented out
- `feature-divider.tsx` — commented out
- `footer.tsx` — superseded by root-level footer
- `map/map.tsx` + `map/svg-map.tsx` — commented out
- `navbar.tsx` — superseded by root-level navbar
- `solar-analytics.tsx` — commented out
- `sticker-card.tsx` — only dep of solar-analytics (unused)
- `testimonial.tsx` — commented out

## Delete: unused public assets (8 files)

- `public/laxdb-logo.tsx` — zero references in src/
- `public/solar-logo.tsx` — zero references in src/
- `public/images/line-chart-illustration.tsx` — only dep of analytics-illustration (unused)
- `public/images/clouds.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/drone.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/droneold.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/farm-footer.webp` — only in unused components
- `public/images/field.png` — only in unused components
- `public/images/smiller.jpeg` — only in unused components

## Fix: clean up index.tsx

Remove 5 commented-out imports in `src/routes/index.tsx` (lines 3-4, 7-9).

## Fix: web feedback type error

`packages/web/src/routes/_protected/$organizationSlug/feedback.tsx:38` — add `attachments` field to match `CreateFeedbackInput` schema.

## Verification

1. `trash` all files listed above
2. Remove commented imports from index.tsx
3. Fix feedback.tsx type error
4. Run `bun run typecheck` — should pass clean

content.thinking:
Let me break this down into the tasks:

1. Delete unused marketing components (14 files)
2. Delete unused ui/ components (10 files)
3. Delete unused public assets (8 files)
4. Clean up index.tsx commented-out imports
5. Fix web feedback type error
6. Run typecheck verification

Let me start by reading the files I need to modify, and then trash the unused files. Let me do this efficiently.

First, let me read the files I need to edit, and start trashing files in parallel.

content.text: I'll tackle this in parallel: read the files I need to edit while trashing unused files.

content.thinking: Now I need to check the `CreateFeedbackInput` schema to know what the `attachments` field should look like.

content.text: Let me check the `CreateFeedbackInput` schema to know the exact type for the `attachments` field.

content.content:
1→import { Schema } from "effect";
     2→
     3→import { TimestampsSchema } from "../schema";
     4→
     5→export const AttachmentSchema = Schema.Struct({
     6→  key: Schema.String,
     7→  name: Schema.String,
     8→  size: Schema.Number,
     9→  type: Schema.String,
    10→});
    11→
    12→export class Feedback extends Schema.Class<Feedback>("Feedback")({
    13→  publicId: Schema.String,
    14→  feedback: Schema.String,
    15→  source: Schema.String,
    16→  attachments: Schema.Array(AttachmentSchema),
    17→  userId: Schema.NullOr(Schema.String),
    18→  userEmail: Schema.NullOr(Schema.String),
    19→  ...TimestampsSchema,
    20→}) {}
    21→
    22→export class CreateFeedbackInput extends Schema.Class<CreateFeedbackInput>(
    23→  "CreateFeedbackInput",
    24→)({
    25→  feedback: Schema.String.pipe(Schema.minLength(10)),
    26→  source: Schema.optionalWith(Schema.String, { default: () => "app" }),
    27→  attachments: Schema.optional(Schema.Array(AttachmentSchema)),
    28→  userId: Schema.optional(Schema.String),
    29→  userEmail: Schema.optional(Schema.String),
    30→}) {}
    31→

content.thinking:
Good. The `CreateFeedbackInput` has `attachments: Schema.optional(Schema.Array(AttachmentSchema))`, so it's optional. The web feedback form at line 38-43 passes:
```
feedbackService.create({
  feedback: data.feedback,
  source: "app",
  userId: session?.user?.id,
  userEmail: session?.user?.email,
});
```

This is missing the `attachments` field. Since it's optional in the schema, let me check if the typecheck actually fails on this. Let me look more carefully...

Actually wait - the plan says to add `attachments` field. Since it's `Schema.optional`, it shouldn't actually cause a type error. 

Let me verify what the actual error is by examining the service definition more closely. In Effect Schema, `Schema.optional` means the field doesn't need to be present in the object, so the type should accept the call as-is. There might be something else going on with how the service is typed.

Actually, I'll just trust the plan and add `attachments: []` to the create call to match the schema exactly. Now I need to clean up the codebase—I'll delete the unused component files and remove the commented-out code from index.tsx and feedback.tsx. I'm checking which image files and components are actually being used before removing them, then I'll delete everything at once.

content.text: Now I have all the context. Let me execute everything in parallel: trash files, edit index.tsx, and fix feedback.tsx.

trash \

input.description: Run typecheck to verify clean build

content.text:
All 8 packages pass typecheck cleanly.

**Summary of changes:**

- **Deleted 32 unused files** (14 root components, 10 ui/ components, 8 public assets) via `trash`
- **Cleaned `index.tsx`** — removed 5 commented-out imports and the commented-out Solar template JSX block
- **Fixed `feedback.tsx`** — added `attachments: []` to the `feedbackService.create()` call to match `CreateFeedbackInput` schema
- **Typecheck passes** — all 8 packages clean
